Method Detail

fixedFunction

public static <M,N,P> Function<M,N,Void> fixedFunction(Function<M,N,P> function,
                                                       P p)
Returns a function which which always invokes function with p.

Type Parameters:
M - The type of input values transformed by this function.
N - The type of output values return by this function.
P - The type of the additional parameter to this function's apply method. Use Void for functions that do not need an additional parameter.
Parameters:
function - The function to wrap.
p - The parameter which will always be passed to function.
Returns:
A function which which always invokes function with p.

normalizeString

public static Function<String,String,Void> normalizeString()
Returns a function which converts a String to lower case using StaticUtils.toLowerCase(org.opends.sdk.util.ByteSequence, java.lang.StringBuilder) and then trims it.

Returns:
A function which converts a String to lower case using StaticUtils.toLowerCase(org.opends.sdk.util.ByteSequence, java.lang.StringBuilder) and then trims it.

valueToAttributeDescription

public static Function<ByteString,AttributeDescription,Void> valueToAttributeDescription()
Returns a function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as an AttributeDescription using the default schema. Invalid values will result in a LocalizedIllegalArgumentException.

Returns:
A function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as an AttributeDescription.

valueToAttributeDescription

public static Function<ByteString,AttributeDescription,Void> valueToAttributeDescription(Schema schema)
Returns a function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as an AttributeDescription using the provided schema. Invalid values will result in a LocalizedIllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
schema - The schema to use for decoding attribute descriptions.
Returns:
A function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as an AttributeDescription.

valueToBoolean

public static Function<ByteString,Boolean,Void> valueToBoolean()
Returns a function which parses the string representation of a ByteString to a Boolean. The function will accept the values 0, false, no, off, 1, true, yes, on. All other values will result in a NumberFormatException.

Returns:
A function which transforms a ByteString to a Boolean.

valueToDN

public static Function<ByteString,DN,Void> valueToDN()
Returns a function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as a DN using the default schema. Invalid values will result in a LocalizedIllegalArgumentException.

Returns:
A function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as an DN.

valueToDN

public static Function<ByteString,DN,Void> valueToDN(Schema schema)
Returns a function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as a DN using the provided schema. Invalid values will result in a LocalizedIllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
schema - The schema to use for decoding DNs.
Returns:
A function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as an DN.

valueToInteger

public static Function<ByteString,Integer,Void> valueToInteger()
Returns a function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as an Integer. Invalid values will result in a NumberFormatException.

Returns:
A function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as an Integer.

valueToLong

public static Function<ByteString,Long,Void> valueToLong()
Returns a function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as a Long. Invalid values will result in a NumberFormatException.

Returns:
A function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as a Long.

valueToString

public static Function<ByteString,String,Void> valueToString()
Returns a function which parses a ByteString as a UTF-8 encoded String.

Returns:
A function which parses the string representation of a ByteString as a UTF-8 encoded String.
